ui_modal_updaterequired_title: Wallpaper Engine trebuie să fie actualizat
ui_modal_updaterequired_body:
Te rugăm să închizi Wallpaper Engine (click dreapta pe iconița din zona de notificare și dă click pe Quit) și repornește-l prin [[[Platform]]] pentru a primi cele mai noi actualizări. În cazul în care această avertizare continuă să apară, te rugăm să verifici fișierele aplicației prin [[[Platform]]].

Versiunea aplicației: {{callerVersion}}, Versiune UI: {{appVersion}}.
ui_modal_updateavailable_body_distro: O nouă actualizare pentru Wallpaper Engine a fost descărcată de către [[[Platform]]] (version {{distroVersion}}). Doriți să reporniți Wallpaper Engine acum pentru a aplica actualizarea?
ui_modal_installationpath_error_title: Wrong Installation Path registered in Windows
ui_modal_installationpath_error_body:
It looks like the program files of Wallpaper Engine have been moved after the installation. This breaks the auto start function and causes a number of problems.

You are currently running Wallpaper Engine from {{runPath}} but [[[Platform]]] has installed Wallpaper Engine to {{steamPath}}. The auto start needs to be updated to use [[[Platform]]]'s correct installation path or this message will continue to appear.

Fix this now?
ui_alert_connect_steam:
No first-time connection to [[[Platform]]] could be made

To remove this message forever: Make sure [[[Platform]]] is running and that you are logged into the correct [[[Platform]]] account and restart Wallpaper Engine. If you need help resolving this [[[Platform]]] issue, check our FAQ: Fix [[[Platform]]] Connection

If you do not own a legal copy of Wallpaper Engine: Please consider supporting our work. We have priced Wallpaper Engine very reasonably so that everyone can afford it. We have poured thousands of hours of work into this application and by buying Wallpaper Engine, you support its continued development, always receive the latest updates, help to pay for server costs and are able to download wallpapers via [[[Platform]]] with ease: Click here to buy Wallpaper Engine on [[[Platform]]]

This message will never appear again after you have started Wallpaper Engine through [[[Platform]]] once.
ui_browse_grid_no_results: Nu există imagini de fundal care să corespundă criteriilor tale.
ui_browse_grid_no_results_generic:
No results found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_steam_status_unavailable_cache:
[[[Platform]]] este indisponibil.
Au fost încărcate {{count}} imagini de fundal din cache.
ui_browse_steam_status_complete:
Actualizare [[[Platform]]] completă.
Au fost transferate {{count}} imagini de fundal în cache.
ui_browse_advertise_explore: Click here to discover new wallpapers from the [[[Host]]]!
ui_browse_advertise_workshop: Click here to search the [[[Host]]] in detail!
ui_browse_no_service_body:
The [[[PLATFORM]]] [[[Host]]] services are currently not available. This is not an error in Wallpaper Engine. Please wait a few hours and try again.

The problem is with the [[[PLATFORM]]] servers and will be resolved soon.
ui_browse_no_service_body_use_backup: Wallpaper Engine will now try to show an emergency backup until the company of [[[PLATFORM]]] ([[[PROVIDER]]]) has sorted out their issues.
ui_browse_steam_offline_notice: [[[PLATFORM]]] [[[Host]]] servers are OFFLINE. You are browsing an emergency backup from {{date}}. Please wait a few hours for the company of [[[PLATFORM]]] ([[[PROVIDER]]]) to fix the [[[PLATFORM]]] [[[Host]]] servers again.
ui_browse_offline_error: [[[PLATFORM]]] servers are OFFLINE. Please wait for [[[PROVIDER]]] to fix [[[PLATFORM]]].
ui_browse_details_properties_reset_promp: Do you want to reset the current properties back to their defaults?
ui_browse_details_properties_preset_hint:
A [[[Host]]] preset includes all of your custom wallpaper settings and any images or videos you may have imported into the wallpaper.

You can publish them on the [[[Platform]]] [[[Host]]] just like regular wallpapers, allowing other users to experience the look and feel with the settings you have created. You can also download presets which other users have shared.
ui_browse_details_properties_apply_to_al: Apply to all Wallpapers and set Default Settings
Changes the default settings for all wallpapers on your current monitors or only changes these settings for the selected wallpapers.
Update all wallpapers and default settings
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_body:
Ești pe punctul de a deschide o aplicație externă necunoscută ca fundal:
{{filepath}}
Wallpaper Engine nu are control asupra acestui fișier, trebuie să te asiguri că acesta provine dintr-o sursă de încredere înainte de a continua.

ACEASTA POATE DĂUNA COMPUTERULUI.
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_disa: Don't ask again for this wallpaper

ui_browse_modal_unsubscribe_body_short: Are you sure that you want to unsubscribe from: {{title}}?
ui_browse_modal_remove_local_body: Ești sigur că doriți să elimini imaginea de fundal locală: {{title}}?
ui_browse_modal_remove_preset_info: The following presets are depending on the wallpaper(s) you are trying to unsubscribe and will be removed as well: {{presets}}
ui_browse_modal_subscribe_preset_body:
The wallpaper {{title}} is a preset for another wallpaper which you need to subscribe to as well to use it.

Subscribe to both now?
ui_browse_open_url_hotkey_info: To use your keyboard on the wallpaper, hide the icons with this hotkey first:
ui_browse_modal_advertise_workshop_body:
Use the filter options on the left side to more easily find what you are looking for rather than searching on [[[Platform]]] directly.

Click on Approved to browse hand-picked wallpapers. Browse the 'most popular' or 'top rated' content if you are looking for high quality submissions.
ui_browse_modal_advertise_workshop_foote: Which genres are you interested in?
ui_browse_properties_volume_disabled: Audio dezactivat în setări
ui_browse_playlist_too_many_items: Too many wallpapers in the playlist to display.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_save_descriptio: Dacă o listă de redare cu același nume există deja, aceasta va fi suprascris.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_video_: Schimbă imaginea de fundal când s-a încheiat un videoclip
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_update: Permite modificarea imaginii de fundal în timpul unei pauze
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_begin_: Always begin with the first wallpaper
ui_browse_profiles_modal_save_descriptio: If a profile with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_save_description: If a preset with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_empty: You have not created any presets for this wallpaper yet.
ui_browse_modal_no_steam_body: [[[Platform]]] [[[Host]]] nu a putut fi inițializat. Încearcă să repornești [[[Platform]]] și apoi Wallpaper Engine. Dacă vezi în continuare această eroare, înseamnă că PC-ul tău nu se poate autentifica corect cu serverele [[[Platform]]], verifică-ți conexiunea la internet și dacă ești conectat(ă) la contul de [[[Platform]]] corect. Serverele [[[Platform]]] ar putea fi, de asemenea, temporar imposibil de accesat.
ui_browse_modal_safe_mode_body:
It looks like the program did not shut down correctly, the last wallpapers and plugins have not been loaded yet to prevent the issue from recurring.

Press OK to restore them now, or cancel to change them first.
ui_browse_explore_category_led_support: Great with Razer Chroma & Corsair iCUE {{emoji}}
ui_browse_explore_server_error: Cannot connect to Wallpaper Engine server to retrieve additional lists.
ui_browse_explore_prompt_to_vote: Vote here to help us find wallpapers that you like!
ui_browse_age_gate_modal_body: Please enter your birth date to continue:
ui_browse_age_gate_modal_sub: This data is for verification purposes only and will not be stored, uploaded or shared.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_genre_de: You are reporting this wallpaper for using an incorrect genre tag. Please consider which genre matches the wallpaper best by choosing what you can 'see' not what you 'know' about this wallpaper personally.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_rating_d: You are reporting this wallpaper for using an incorrect rating and violating the nudity and violence rules. If the wallpaper cannot be tagged as 'questionable' or 'mature', please choose the 'BAN' option, which will result in the wallpaper being removed.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_copyrigh: Please use [[[PROVIDER]]]'s DMCA form to submit copyright violations, this will make sure it is dealt with in the legally correct manner.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_spam_des: You are reporting this wallpaper for spam by the author.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_offensiv: You are reporting this wallpaper for containing offensive content. Do not use this option to report nudity and instead choose the option 'wrong content rating'.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_other_de: Please choose the proper category before submitting your report! If it does not fit anywhere else, use this category.
ui_browse_report_modal_error: The report failed to be sent. The server might be offline, unreachable or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.
ui_browse_report_modal_error_401: The report failed to be sent. Your [[[Platform]]] game ticket seems to have expired. Please try restarting [[[Platform]]] and the wallpaper browser to get a new ticket.
ui_browse_modal_folder_remove_body: Are you sure that you want to remove this folder?
ui_browse_modal_folder_remove_unsubscrib: Unsubscribe or remove wallpapers in folder
ui_browse_download_missing_files: Missing files. Verify the program in [[[Platform]]].
ui_browse_modal_seasonal_info_body:
We have changed the theme of Wallpaper Engine to match the occasion! The theme will be changed back in a couple of days.

You can disable seasonal theming in the settings if you don't like this or change the skin there any time.

The Discover tab also has a special list of wallpapers that match the holiday!
ui_browse_modal_steam_redownload_error_b:
Wallpaper Engine has detected that a lot of your wallpapers are being downloaded by [[[Platform]]] right now.

If you have recently subscribed a lot of new wallpapers, then please ignore this message and wait for [[[Platform]]] to finish downloading everything.

If it looks like [[[Platform]]] is downloading a lot of wallpapers that you already downloaded before, then [[[Platform]]] has run into an error. This is not a bug in Wallpaper Engine. Please see this post Fix [[[Platform]]] re-downloading everything or wait for [[[Platform]]] to finish downloading and fix itself.
ui_settings_seasonal_theme_hint: Changes the theme during special times of the year
ui_settings_hotkeys_group_wallpaper_stub: You can assign hotkeys to wallpapers, playlists or profiles in the wallpaper browser.
ui_settings_hotkeys_modal_prompt_overrid: This key is already assigned to '{{action}}'. Do you want to assign it here instead?
ui_settings_hotkeys_example:
Hotkeys must contain Ctrl, Shift, Alt. Examples:

Shift + Ctrl + B
Shift + F1

A red border means that your hotkey is not valid.
ui_settings_adjust_windows_color_warning:
IMPORTANT: Please be aware that enabling this feature will modify the look and feel of your Windows. Wallpaper Engine is not able to revert back to your current theme. If you wish to revert to your old design, you need to manually change your Windows Theme color settings.

If you don't know how to do that or if you use an unactivated version of Windows that doesn't allow you to do that, please DO NOT enable this feature!

The colors cannot be reverted by Wallpaper Engine. They can be reverted in the Windows settings instead.
ui_settings_plugins_options_led_plugin_d: Controls LED effects from Corsair and Razer devices.
ui_settings_advanced_reset_config_modal_: Toate setările tale vor fi eliminate și aplicația trebuie să repornească.
ui_settings_advanced_monitor_identificat:
This setting controls how Wallpaper Engine assigns wallpapers to individual screens. If you have any issues with wallpapers being swapped between monitors or wallpapers not showing up after restarting or hibernating your PC, try changing this option. Due to the variety of issues in graphics drivers and Windows itself, there is no generally recommended setting and you may need to try multiple options.

Device Path
This assigns wallpapers directly to the name of the graphics card adapter and the name of the monitor. If you change the graphics card cables or change your screen, the wallpaper has to be selected for the new configuration again. However, you can change the multi-monitor layout or the primary monitor and the wallpapers will stay where you assigned them. This is a stable and the recommended method. You will not have problems with this unless your graphics driver has severe issues.

Layout
This orders the monitors based on their virtual position in Windows. If you change the multi-monitor layout, change your primary monitor, or remove monitors then the program may not restore the wallpapers the way you expect. You should use this option only if your driver gives you too many problems with the default 'Device Path' option and if you do not change your monitors regularly.

GDI
Identify monitors based on how Windows orders and names them. If this option works for you, you will be able to restore the same wallpaper to every monitor even if you replace the monitors themselves but keep their general position. Has a high probability of swapping wallpapers randomly every time you start the PC or resume from sleep - for many people this is relatively prone to errors and won't work well.

Deprecated
Similar to the 'GDI' option which uses an older method of identifying monitors. It is generally the most error-prone option but in rare cases it may solve Windows or graphics card driver-related issues. Only try this as a last resort.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_tip:
Use this option if you have any compatibility issues after Windows hibernation. This will make the program fully restart after hibernation to fix issues caused by other programs on the computer.

Fix crash after hibernation
If Wallpaper Engine crashes after hibernation, then Windows is not correctly restoring the graphics driver and Wallpaper Engine in order. This option may help on your system to fix this.

Fix LED effects after hibernation
Some LED utilities may block the connection to Wallpaper Engine after hibernation and the LED effects will stop working. This option may help fixing this by fully restarting Wallpaper Engine and making it reconnect to the LED utilities.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_error_au: You need to enable the auto start option with high priority at the top of this page before you can use this.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_enable_w:
Only use this option if you experience issues with Wallpaper Engine after hibernation.

This option is only required if something causes Wallpaper Engine to stop working properly after hibernation and it will make it restart every time you set Windows to hibernate.
ui_settings_advanced_restart_setting_mod: The program needs to be restarted to apply the settings. Restart now?
ui_settings_highpriority_warning: Modul de prioritate ridicată va lansa aplicația mai repede folosind un 'serviciu Windows'. Dar dacă te mai confrunți cu probleme la această soluție, încearc-o fără o prioritate ridicată, care va fi mai fiabilă, dar mai lentă.
ui_welcome_intro:
Aceasta este o scurtă introducere pentru a începe și pentru a configura câteva opțiuni importante pentru tine.

Tot ceea ce ajustezi aici poate fi, de asemenea, schimbat mai târziu din nou!
ui_welcome_quality_body: Alege o presetare de calitate pentru a personaliza performanța și fidelitatea vizuală (dacă este cazul pentru tapet). Poți mai apoi personaliza aceste opțiuni în setări mai târziu:
ui_welcome_windows_color_description: Permite imaginilor de fundal să ajusteze automat culoarea frontală Windows:
ui_welcome_finish_body:
Totul este configurat!

Wallpaper Engine va fi acum disponibil în tava dvs. de notificări. Apasă dublu clic pe pentru a selecta o imagine de fundal sau apasă clic dreapta pentru a accesa setările, [[[Platform]]] [[[Host]]] sau Wallpaper Editor.
ui_editor_delete_project_modal_body:
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete the project:
{{title}} ?

You will not be able to update or use this project after deleting it.
ui_editor_no_animation_modal_body:
It looks like you are trying to upload a scene wallpaper without animation. This is not recommended.

Wallpaper Engine is optimized for animated wallpapers, so if you only want to use a static image, it is advisable to use your operating system in that case.

Do you want to continue anyway?
ui_editor_review_info_body:
Your wallpaper will be reviewed before other users can find and download it to ensure that it doesn't violate any local laws.

If you update your wallpaper, it has to be reviewed again and is pushed to the back of the queue.
ui_editor_importer_crop_transparency_hel:
The transparent area will be cropped and your image will be resized to improve performance.

If you update your image later, make sure to not shrink or extend the transparent area, since that could cause issues with existing effects that you have added.
ui_editor_importer_crop_transparency_war: It looks like the transparent area of the image changed. If you have any effects on this image already you might have to fix them if you continue to import this image.
ui_editor_importer_gif_warning_body:
The GIF you are trying to import occupies a lot of memory when converted into a more usable format. Wallpaper Engine can try to convert it anyway, but the process might fail with an error.

The GIF format is generally unsuitable for high resolution images and/or a lot of frames, you should consider using an .mp4 video wallpaper because that would perform better.
ui_editor_publish_modal_publish_prompt_a: Trebuie să accepți acordul Atelierului [[[Platform]]] înainte ca tapetul tău să fie vizibil pentru ceilalți. Vizitează-ți fundalul pe Atelierul [[[Platform]]] acum:
ui_editor_publish_modal_info_asset_reuse: By uploading an asset to the [[[Platform]]] [[[Host]]], you agree that other users may re-use and possibly re-upload modified versions of your asset without notice to you. Deleted assets will still persist in already created wallpapers.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_as: Please choose what kind of assets you would like to share on [[[Host]]]:
Publish as asset pack. Users will be able to import each layer separately.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_la: Select the layers that you would like to share:
There are no eligible layers to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_ef: Select the effect that you would like to share:
There are no eligible effects to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_warn_advanced_assets_creation_:
This option should only be used by advanced users who are familiar with the editor and have published a few Scene wallpapers before.

Enabling this will add buttons to the editor that allow you to create new single assets to be shared on the [[[Host]]] for others to re-use in their own wallpapers.
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_create_new_e:
You are about to duplicate the effect '{{effect}}' and create a new, editable effect where you can change the shaders in any way you like.

Choose a unique name for the new effect:
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_delete_effec:
Are you sure that you want to delete the effect '{{effect}}'?

This will break all usages of that effect inside the wallpaper and this cannot be undone!
ui_editor_workshop_options_monetization_: (Imaginea de fundal va fi votată și vândută.)
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_body: The preview image must be suitable for everyone. Please refer to this table to choose an appropriate content rating. If in doubt, choose a more restrictive rating. Submitting illegal content or rating your submission too low can get the submission banned and the account flagged. Keep in mind that you do not need to submit wallpapers to use them for yourself.
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_no_ratin: Please make sure that any content you upload is suitable for everyone! If you upload anything questionable or illegal, your submission or your entire account may be banned.
ui_editor_user_properties_select_info: Choose a property with a compatible type ({{types}}).
ui_editor_user_properties_select_unused_: This property is not being used by the wallpaper.
ui_editor_user_properties_combo_value: Selected combo value for this link:
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions:
1. Desenează un dreptunghi cu mouseul.
2. Apasă Enter pentru a face o fotografie.

Apasă Space pentru a întrerupe.
Apasă Escape pentru a anula.
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_body: Înainte de a trimite fundalul la Atelier, asigură-te că acesta nu încalcă [[[Platform]]] ToS, altfel acesta va fi eliminat:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_list_head: În special, există următoarele reguli pentru imaginile de fundal, imaginea și descrierea previzualizării:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_rule_offe: Niciun conținut jignitor sau violență / gore
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_rule_copy: Nu există încălcări ale drepturilor de autor
ui_editor_effects_modal_imagelayer_descr: Importă o imagine de pe computer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_fullscreenlayer_: Adaugă un strat translucid care acoperă întregul ecran. Orice efecte aplicate acestui strat vor afecta obiectele care au fost desenate pe ecran înaintea acestui strat.
ui_editor_effects_modal_solidlayer_descr: Adds a solid layer with a background of a simple color. Can be used in combination with other effects.
ui_editor_effects_modal_composelayer_des: Adaugă un strat translucid de mărime specifică. Atașează alte obiecte ca și copii la acest strat pentru a le combina într-o singură textură căreia îi poți aplica efecte.
ui_editor_effects_modal_model_descriptio: Imporă un model 3D de pe computer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_particle_system_: Create a new particle effect from scratch.
ui_editor_effects_modal_sound_descriptio: Add looping background music or randomly playing ambient sounds.
ui_editor_effects_modal_compatibility_wa:
You are about to import an effect with a newer version than used by this project. This may result in all instances of this effect being reset and you will lose their settings.

This is not reversible and your old settings will be lost. You may want to make a backup of the project before proceeding.

Do you want to continue?
ui_editor_effect_blend_description: Amestecă două imagini sau straturi de imagine cu diferite moduri de amestecare.
ui_editor_effect_blur_description: Aplică o imagine neclară gaussiană. Susține o mască opțională.
ui_editor_effect_blur_precise_descriptio: Aplică estomparea gaussiană la întreaga imagine în rezoluție completă.
ui_editor_effect_color_key_description: Maschează o parte a imaginii care se potrivește cu o culoare de alegere.
ui_editor_effect_edge_detection_descript: Detectează marginile imaginii utilizând filtrul de sârmă.
ui_editor_effect_fisheye_description: Adaugă o deviere de ochi de pește.
ui_editor_effect_foliage_sway_descriptio: Balansează obiectul în fiecare colț al imaginii.
ui_editor_effect_godrays_description: Adaugă god rays direcțional sau circular.
ui_editor_effect_local_contrast_descript: Aplică o îmbunătățire a contrastului local la imagine.
ui_editor_effect_motion_blur_description: Acumulează imaginea în timp pentru a crea un efect de estompare a mișcării.
ui_editor_effect_opacity_description: Adaugă o mască de opacitate la imagine.
ui_editor_effect_pulse_description: Adaugă efecte de lumină tremurândă și pulsând lumină.
ui_editor_effect_reflection_description: Adaugă un efect de reflecție la imagine. Desenează o mască pentru a defini unde ar trebui să apară reflexia.
ui_editor_effect_scroll_description: Derulează imaginea pe orizontală sau pe verticală.
ui_editor_effect_shake_description: Adaugă o animație de agitare. Numai zonele mascate vor fi afectate. Vor fi realizate animații rigide și netede.
ui_editor_effect_tint_description: Tintul imaginii cu o culoare de alegere.
ui_editor_effect_transform_description: Aplică scalarea, rotirea și compensarea imaginii.
ui_editor_effect_vhs_description: Distortion and colorization of an old video tape.
ui_editor_effect_water_flow_description: Adaugă o animație pentru flux. Direcția poate fi controlată cu o mască de curgere pe care o poți picta în editor.
ui_editor_effect_water_ripple_descriptio: Adaugă o animație de puls. Desenează o mască pentru a limita animația într-o anumită zonă a imaginii.
ui_editor_effect_water_waves_description: Adaugă un efect de undă simplu folosind valuri de apă.
ui_editor_effect_fire_description: Adds a fire stream to the image. Color can be freely modified.
ui_editor_effect_xray_description: Blends between two images based on cursor position.
ui_editor_effect_shine_description: Applies a shine effect to bright parts of the image with a variable number of edges.
ui_editor_preset_light_shafts_descriptio: Adaugă arbori de iluminat pe fundal.
ui_editor_preset_snow_particles_descript: Adăugă particule de zăpadă care cad încet din partea de sus a ecranului.
ui_editor_preset_rain_description: Adds rain particles. Optionally with refraction/distortion of the background image.
ui_editor_preset_interactive_description: Interactive particles that are affected by the cursor.
ui_editor_preset_clock_description: Insert a clock into your scene.
ui_editor_preset_countdown_description: Insert a countdown into your scene.
ui_editor_script_unsaved_changes_body: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to keep them?
ui_editor_properties_led_source: Limit iCUE & Chroma to this layer
ui_editor_particle_delete_particle_body: Are you sure you want to delete the particle system {{particle}}?
ui_editor_particle_duplicate_particle_bo: Enter the name of the new particle system:
ui_editor_particle_new_particle_body: Enter the name of the new particle system:
ui_editor_particle_add_element_emitter_b: Select an emitter that creates new particles.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_initializ: Select an initializer that is applied when a particle spawns.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_operator_: Select an operator that simulates the particle over time.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_renderer_: Select a renderer that controls the way particles are displayed.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_children_: Select an existing particle system as a child.
